document.full_text: israel charged a detained palestinian engineer on monday with hundreds of counts of attempted murder, accusing him of developing missiles that the islamist group hamas fired from gaza against israelis.
document.title: israel charges gaza engineer as rocket mastermind
lines_and_colors: israel charged a detained palestinian engineer on monday with hundreds of counts of attempted murder, accusing him of developing missiles that the islamist group hamas fired from gaza against israelis.
